Robert is an ordinary man who is faced with extraordinary circumstances. 
He is locked in a meat freezer by Russian thugs who believe that he owes them 8 million dollars. 
Robert, who is in every frame of the film soon discovers that he is not alone in the freezer. 
Sam, a stranger, is also locked in with him, and it becomes a struggle to survive 
the cold and the forces that are against them.
